name: my Bridge Assistant
description:
MyBridgeAssistant is an extensive app to help you improve the cards play.
First, deal a board. Then, set a contract. Here you are, you can play. Test indefinitely various combinations, pick up cards, change contract, play in defense.
You want to save a board ? Set your criteria, enter title and notes as you wish and save.
You’ve got a long list of saved boards ? Filter the list against your criteria and see only the relevant ones.
Let’s start !

Main Features:
Manual or semi-automated deal, Display number of dealt cards per hand, Automated ranking of cards regardless of deal order, Pick-up wrongly dealt card, Total redeal of board, Display handicap points per hand.
Setting of contract
Display number of tricks (done / to be done) for declarer and defense, Option to rotate hands in order to put dummy on top of screen, Pick up of any card during a trick, Last card in requested suit automatically played, Last trick automatically played.
Title and notes entry for a board to be saved, Set of criteria to qualify a board to be saved, Add/Modify a board
Replay board
Order, filter and display list of saved boards, Play selected saved board, Delete board

The app also includes specific bridge security features such as : Maximum of 13 dealt cards per hand, Card deal uniqueness, Contract setting not available until deal complete, Play not available until contract is set, played card can’t be played again, Playing two cards in one trick not allowed, Suit revoke not possible, Opening leader set per trick, Trick validating only after 4 cards played

This app is still in its youth. Your comments (in App Store) and ratings (through the app) will be highly appreciated for app improvements. More features will also be delivered in upcoming versions. Optimized for iPhone 6 and later models and for iPad.

Make sure to visit our assistance web site to get more explanations, photos and videos to improve your experience with my Bridge Assistant
